name: Pixel Tresaure Hunt
description:
Gameplay video:

Description:

Hi,Pixel Tresaure Hunt is a small prototype that doesn't offer much game content yet, but many functionalities.

An inventory system, setting the screen resolution, setting the sounds, file storage system, items that stack. In the future it will be followed by:

-a bigger map

-Crafting system

-Animals and enemies

-skill tree

-new player animations

Current Plaform: PC Windows
